name: Seelie
desc: Once a mighty race that lived to guide mankind. They have been cursed to degenerate into nothing but empty husks. They show those who follow them treasures hidden from human eyes.

customize.name: Angels
customize.desc: Also known as Heavenly envoys, their primary duties were to help people. They were later expelled from Celestia and consequently lost their bodies and minds.

customize.text: Once, Seelie were angels. The first angel fell in love with a Voyager from a distant world, and they decided to go against the laws established by the Heavenly Principles. For this betrayal, the first angel was stripped of her name and flesh, and all angels were cursed: If they dared gaze into another's eyes, and to one alone offer the love that was meant for all, then not only would their divine beauty crumble into the wind, but their minds would fall to dust, until from the fallen one's remains, a Seelie would rise, forever drifting in search of fading memories to consume. After the war with the invaders from beyond the skies, the angels were banished and stripped of their minds and bodies.

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.text: The Heavenly Principles created angels and exiled them from Celestia.

customize.name: Elemental Dragons
customize.desc: An ancient race, who ruled Teyvat long before human existence. Dragons belong to the Light Realm.

customize.text: Dragons killed almost all Seelie in Natlan, so the latter can be found only in the Night Kingdom.
The most common type of the Seelie

Warming Seelie found in Dragonspine were mutated due to the unique climate conditions of this place. The gentle warmth of a Warming Seelie can help alleviate the effects of the bitter cold. Perhaps its warmth can also be used to trigger some ruin mechanisms.

Luminous Seelie found in the underground Chasm were mutated by the unique climate conditions of this place. Being close to a Luminous Seelie will gradually recharge the Lumenstone Adjuvant's energy. The light from such a Seelie can also activate some devices.
Electro Seelie can be found in Inazuma. These Seelie move at high speed and will apply Electro to anything nearby.
A type of Seelie that can be found near the Withering Zones in Sumeru. These Seelie help to decrease the accumulation of Decay.

customize.name: Mini Seelie: Dayflower
customize.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature sea-blue Seelie. Unlike other Seelie, it does not serve to guide others, but to follow them to see the world.

customize.name: Mini Seelie: Moss
customize.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.

A miniature green Seelie. It becomes most happy indeed when it gets close to a tree.

customize.name: Mini Seelie: Brilliance
customize.desc:
A memento from Lost Riches. Equip the Seelie to gain its company.

A mini Seelie with brilliant colors. It can move freely underwater.

customize.name: Mini Seelie: Viola
customize.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature purple Seelie. Its color is very similar to that of Electro-infused items. Who knows if you might get a little tingle from poking it...

customize.name: Mini Seelie: Rosé
customize.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature powder-pink Seelie. Though it cannot say a word, it will silently follow a traveler that strikes its fancy around the world.

customize.name: Mini Seelie: Curcuma
customize.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature golden Seelie. It gives off a feeling very similar to that of Mora. They say that Seelie of this color represent good fortune.

customize.text: Unlike other Seelie, Mini Seelie does not serve to guide others but instead follows them to see the world.

customize.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
customize.desc:
A small and special Seelie, particularly sensitive to the presence of Iron Coins.
A companion entrusted to you by Ulman. Seelie are naturally inclined to guide people, though this Seelie seems weaker than usual, and possesses a remarkable obsession with Iron Coins...

customize.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
customize.desc:
A small and special Seelie, particularly sensitive to the presence of Iron Coins.
A companion entrusted to you by Ulman. Seelie are naturally inclined to guide people, though this Seelie seems weaker than usual, and possesses a remarkable obsession with Iron Coins...

customize.text: Ulman's Treasure-Seeking Seelie. This special Seelie is particularly sensitive to the presence of Iron Coins.
